item.description:
Let's go GLOW candlepin bowling!!!!

Remember at this location we get FREE shoes, so remember to tell them at the desk that you are with the Meetup group.  When we all get there we will be split up into teams.

Cost: $27.00 per hour/per lane, 6 ppl per lane.  The cost that you will pay will be split between all the people in your lane, when we are finished bowling the person at the counter will tell us how much is owed each!

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (A Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come in and find us, we will be sitting at the tables waiting for everyone when we all get there we will get our shoes.
item.name: Glow candlepin bowling is back!!!
